reviewText: I first started working as a hospice social worker in 1994.  I have worked at 5 different hospices: in Kansas, Colorado, and South Dakota.  This is an excellent video.  I've used it with new staff/volunteers as well as shown it to bereaved during Grief Support Groups.  When I was first working, we had it in VHS format, so the shoulder pads and outfits the people wear are a bit dated, but the content is great.
